DOC.brief_summary: This multiple ascend dose study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics immunogenicity PRX002 approximately 60 patient Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study PRX002 Patients With Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic Parkinson 's disease , Hoehn Yahr 13 Body weight range ≥ 45kg/99 lbs ≤ 110 kg/242 lbs Female subject must surgically sterile postmenopausal childbearing potential must use contraception Male subject partner childbearing potential must use contraception Significant cardiac history Abnormal MRI Significant laboratory abnormality
